title: Adaptive Physical Education for Students with Cerebral Palsy: Applying the Floor Time Approach for [Large-Scale] Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of special education and adaptive physical education
context.additional_context: Training course for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields on adaptive physical education methods to improve motor skills in students with cerebral palsy. Utilization of smartphones and simple assistive tools in limited technological environments.

learning_goals: Explain the core principles of the Floor Time Approach and apply them to adaptive physical education for students with cerebral palsy.
Design and implement a step-by-step instructional strategy for teaching the sidelying (rolling to the side) motor skill.
Observation and feedback techniques can be applied to enhance learner engagement in blended learning environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
